render_info.source_dynamic: select news.Name as TenTin , news.PostingFromDTG as NgayDang , news.NumberOfPublish as TongSoBai , cata.Name as DanhMuc , (select count(1) from CampaignNews cam where cam.NewsID = news.NewsID and cam.Deleted = 0) as SoLuong , news.Content as DanhGia , (select count(1) from PositiveNews pos where pos.NewsID = news.NewsID and pos.Deleted = 0) as SoLuongTinBai from News news left join CatalogNews cata on cata.CatalogNewsID = news.CatalogID and cata.Deleted = 0 where news.Deleted = 0 and news.Type = 2
